channel.title: ML on Aniruddha Deb
channel.description: Recent content in ML on Aniruddha Deb

item.title: Introducing the MLZoo
item.description: After a few days of reading and furious coding, I’m happy to announce the creation of MLZoo: a set of ML algorithms in their natural habitat MLZoo is a set of jupyter notebooks which would contain implementations of several ML algorithms on real world datasets: so far, I’ve implemented different flavours of regression, and plan to add quite a few more algorithms over the summer. Do star, fork and contribute in any way possible!
